entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:12 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -28.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 7:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -28.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -44
Dewpoint: -31.4°C
Wind: NNE 35 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 28.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow at times overnight. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 28. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 35 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 35 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 50 in the evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023
